About Amusement Academy International

Leading the industry in professional safety education since 2025

Our Mission

To advance safety standards in the amusement industry through comprehensive education, professional development, and industry-leading certification programs. We bridge the gap between regulatory requirements and practical implementation.

Industry Recognition

IAAPA Member

International Association of Amusement Parks and Attractions

ASTM F24 Committee

Amusement Rides and Devices Standards

NAARSO Certified

North American Amusement Ride Safety Officials

Our Expertise

With decades of combined experience in amusement safety, our team brings unparalleled expertise to every course, certification, and consultation. We work directly with manufacturers, operators, and regulatory bodies to ensure our curriculum reflects current industry standards and emerging best practices.

  • Ride safety inspection and maintenance
  • Regulatory compliance and documentation
  • Risk assessment and management
  • Emergency response procedures
  • Staff training and development
